message.body: I know you're in Michigan but any chance you're doing nothing right now and can listen to me vent?
AAAHHH IT IS BLUE FOR IPHONE! Yay!!!
Or girl who said boyfriend can find out because she friended me on Facebook, as opposed to my saying something on Monday? Is that weird?
Yeah... Unless one of you brings it up in person, it's gonna be weird. I suggest you bring it up if she doesn't. Especially if you might want to be friends with her.
I will. I already friended everyone
